description:
Last years sold out visual concert is back by popular demand.

****************
For The Love of Justice

A soulful journey of love in all forms led by Danielle Ponder & the Tomorrow People
Little Theatre - Rochester, NY

“Justice is what love looks like in public.”—Cornell West
*****************

Tickets available at:
https://omniwebticketing.com/the-little/?schdate=2017-12-01&film=880999698&ptime=20:30&ptype=G
name: Danielle Ponder & The Tomorrow People Live at the Little Theatre
